Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: COP 4600 or  EEL 4768 C or  EEL4742C

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Introduction to specification, analysis, design, and validation techniques for real-time (operating) systems with an emphasis on real-time scheduling theory.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Engineering and Computer Science

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Micro-Electro Mechanical Systems devices, microfabrication, sensors and actuators, bulk and surface micromachining, optical MEMS, instrumentation and applications.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Engineering and Computer Science

EEE4346C - Hardware Security and Trusted.name: EEE4346C - Hardware Security and Trusted Circuit Design

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: EEL 3801C with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Design, analysis and synthesis of sequential logic circuits and systems. Data path and controller design using a hardware descriptive language. Case studies on hardware security.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Engineering and Computer Science

EEE4314 - Device Electronics for Integra.name: EEE4314 - Device Electronics for Integrated Circuits

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: P.N. Junctions, Bipolar Transistor Analysis, Metal Semiconductor contacts, MOS Systems MOSFET Analysis and Limitations.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Engineering and Computer Science

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Grade of "C" (2.0) or better in both COP 3503C and EEE 3342C.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Introduction to computer-aided design techniques for high-level synthesis, logic synthesis, and physical synthesis. Emphasis on algorithms and data structures.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Engineering and Computer Science

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: EEL 3123C with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Electronic devices including p-n junctions, bipolar transistors, field effect transistors and device models.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Engineering and Computer Science

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: EEL 3004C with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better and PHY 3101.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Semiconductor device physics, energy band diagrams, electronic devices including p-n junctions, bipolar transistors, field effect transistors and device models.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Engineering and Computer Science

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MAC 2311C, MAC 2312, PHY 2048C   , PHY 2049C    all with a "C" (2.0) or better grade.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Combinational and sequential logic circuits including registers, arithmetic units, memories, finite state machines, and design with programmable logic devices.

College.title: College

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: EEE 3307C, EEE 3342C with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better. Ideal Op-Amps and applications.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Introduction to Logic Circuits; Bipolar, MOS and CMOS families; Flip-flops and memory cells, comparators and timing circuits: A/D and D/A converters.
